mapper.insert: insert into protectdog(useremail, dogkind, dogage, gender, neutralization,dogspecific, place, noticedate, noticeend) values (#{useremail}, #{dogkind}, #{dogage}, #{gender}, #{neutralization}, #{specific}, #{place}, #{noticedate}, #{noticeend})
mapper.update: update communitypost set useremail=#{useremail}, dogkind=#{dogkind}, dogage=#{dogage}, gender=#{gender}, neutralization=#{neutralization} , dogspecific=#{specific}, adoptionstate=#{adoptionstate}, place=#{place}
mapper.select: select sheltername from sheltermember where email=#{email}
